title: Call of Duty: Vanguard
description:
Rise on every front: Dogfight over the Pacific , airdrop over France, defend Stalingrad with a sniperâ€™s precision and blast through advancing forces in North Africa. The Call of Duty franchise returns with Call of Duty Vanguard, developed by Sledgehammer Games, where players will be immersed in visceral WWII combat on an unprecedented global scale. LEGO Star Wars III: The Clone Wars
Call of Duty Vanguard includes a deeply engaging single player Campaign, a massive Multiplayer offering featuring over 20 maps including 16 built for core Multiplayer and an exciting new Zombies experience developed by Treyarch.
Call of Duty: Vanguard features cross-progression and cross-generation play, in addition to Multiplayer maps, modes and more.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470

game_info.Developer: Sledgehammer Games, Treyarch, High Moon Studios, Raven Software, Beenox, Demonware
